text: Egba Kotan II is the king of the Yoruba State of Dassa in central Benin. The king rose to the throne on March 3, 2002. ==See also== *List of rulers of the Yoruba state of Dassa *List of current constituent African monarchs ==References== Category:21st-century Beninese people Category:Obas of Benin Category:Beninese Ahmadis
title: Egba Kotan II
